sentences.sContent: ...they may easily overlook teenagers who are engaging in inconspicuous behaviors...

sentences.sCn: 我们的房间可以俯视大海。

sentences.sContent: It is easy to overlook a small detail like that.
sentences.sCn: 那样的小细节很容易被忽略。

sentences.sContent: She found him entertaining enough to overlook his faults.
sentences.sCn: 她觉得他很有趣，足以让她包容他的缺点。

synos.tran: 忽略；俯瞰；远眺；检查；高耸于…之上

trans.tranOther: if a house, room etc overlooks something, it has a view of it, usually from above
